mapper.select: select * from department_info where di_name like #{keyword} order by di_seq desc limit 10 offset #{offset}
select count(*) from department_info where di_name like #{keyword}
mapper.insert: insert into department_info(di_name, di_gratuate_score, di_status) values (#{di_name}, #{di_gratuate_score}, #{di_status})
mapper.update: update department_info set di_name=#{di_name}, di_gratuate_score=#{di_gratuate_score}, di_status=#{di_status}, di_mod_dt=NOW() where di_seq = #{di_seq}
